articles.title: Stampede at railway station in India kills at least 18 - CBS News
articles.description: Many of the victims were Hindu pilgrims who were traveling to the Maha Kumbh festival in Prayagraj in northern India, officials said.
articles.content:
At least 18 people, including 14 women, were killed in a stampede at a railway station in India's capital of New Delhi, the Press Trust of India news agency reported Sunday.
Many of the victims were… [+1750 chars]
